Stellaris Rust Application

Welcome to the Stellaris Rust application. This is a sample frontend for the API.

Available API Endpoints:

Get all users

GET /api/v1/users

Create a new user

POST /api/v1/users

Body: {"name": "string", "email": "string"}

Get a specific user

GET /api/v1/users/{id}

Update a user

PUT /api/v1/users/{id}

Body: {"name": "string", "email": "string"}

Delete a user

DELETE /api/v1/users/{id}
